1:
To you I lift up my eyes,\q you who are enthroned in the heavens.
\q
2:
See, as the eyes of servants look to their master's hand,\q as the eyes of a maid look to her mistress's hand,
\q so our eyes look to Yahweh our God
\q until he has mercy on us.


\q
3:
Have mercy on us, Yahweh, have mercy on us,\q for we are filled with humiliation.
\q
4:
We are more than full\q of the scoffing of the insolent
\q and with the contempt of the proud.
